content: As an AI language model, I cannot shop or feel the experience to say, but based on the technology trend and convenience, it's highly likely that AR technology will become even more prevalent in the retail industry, helping to create a more interactive and enjoyable shopping experience for customers. With AR, customers can visualize how products will look in their lives before making a purchase, which can help to boost customer satisfaction and reduce returns. Moreover, AR technologies can also help retailers to overcome some of the limitations of traditional retail and e-commerce, such as lack of engagement, limited selection or inability to try before buying. So, it's very likely that more retailers will start to adopt AR technologies to remain competitive, making shopping experience more convenient and fun.
